unnormalised: Hey everyone, thanks for the injury updates! Hope Jadeja recovers quickly from that nasty fall in Bangalore. Any news on Bumrah? Remember how much we needed him during the last World Cup... felt like *Lagaan* all over again! The NCA physios are top-notch, so hopefully, he'll be back bowling those yorkers soon. Fingers crossed for a speedy recovery for all the boys, especially with the upcoming series! Any updates on Hardik's back too? Thanks!
